column1: matlakala ahao a kae wena neuoe
ketlare leye kantle ha leetsa lerata tjena
hei ake uutlwe lineo le mathale
roballa ka nqane keneuoe ngwanana seke chechella kwana hle mmannyeo
ae keneuoe hlobola kobo utsebe hodula feela
otlauotla ka seeta sena haholo nkong mona
seka itsetleha ka bethe ya batho
